document_data.mainbody: '''Hurgan Stoneblade''' was a [[dwarf]] who lived in [[Ulgoth's Beard]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: Hurgan had in his possession an [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] [[warhammer]] known as the ''[[Kneecapper]]''.
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Hurgan sought to retrieve the ''[[Soultaker dagger]]'' from the menacing [[Durlag's Tower]]. The magical dagger was an heirloom of [[Clan Stoneblade]], that once belonged to the heroic adventurer [[Arlo Stoneblade|Arlo]], .

The [[1369 DR|following year]], he traveled to the [[Amn]]ian city of [[Athkatla]] in order to attend the funeral of his friend [[Lord de'Arnise]].
